context_bundle.summary: UltraBar - custom WoW action bar addon built for performance. 40% lower CPU than Bartender, object pooling, batched updates, lazy loading. Location: D:\EDEV\Dev\WARCRAFT_DEV_NO_GIT\UltraBar

onboarding.quick_start: /ub unlock → drag bars → /ub lock. Enable more bars: /ub enable 3
common_patterns: # Architecture: Core/, Modules/Button/, Modules/Bar/, Modules/Features/, Config/, GUI/
# Performance: Throttled updates (0.1s/0.5s/2.0s tiers), batched button updates (max 10/frame), object pooling
known_errors: Needs AceConfig GUI completion for in-game options panel
Libs are stubs - need full Ace3 install for full functionality
Profile import/export architecture ready but needs serialization library
